message.body: ...what is that? Abc in a cup?
Good luck on your first day!!! Today's the first day, right? Yayayayay! Go Phuong!

Hahahah awwww thank you so much Jen! That's so sweet (I'm smiling with cheezzze right now)!!! Turns out though, I'm not starting until next Monday. My boss got off for a few days so they decided to have me start next week. Nevertheless, I will pretend that your message was sent form the future to prepare me for my first day :)))))
Haha. Or I'll send another one on Monday. It'll be bigger and grander.
Oh yayzzzzzz! I look forward to that because I'm not kidding when I say that I'll be freaking out the night before.
Awww. Don't worry. You'll do great!!!!
